import React, { useState } from 'react' import { AiOutlineArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/ai' import { VscDashboard } from 'react-icons/vsc' import { List, ListItem, Tooltip } from '@material-ui/core' import styled from 'styled-components' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ListNavItem = styled(ListItem)` &:hover{ background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.08); } ` const Sidebar = () => { const [collapse, setCollapse] = useState(false) return (
Dashboard
) } export default Sidebar
